description:
Have you ever wanted to change the way your DataFrame is displayed? Perhaps you needed to see more rows or columns, or modify the formatting of numbers? In this video, I'll demonstrate how to change the settings for five common display options in pandas.

This is video 28 of 30 in the series, `Easier data analysis in Python with pandas <http://www.dataschool.io/easier-data-analysis-with-pandas/>`__. The notebook and datasets shown in the video are available on `GitHub <https://github.com/justmarkham/pandas-videos>`__.
title: How do I change display options in pandas?
